蛝字的基本解释

蛝
xián
古同“蚿”。
蚁卵。

蛝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xián］
［《廣韻》户閒切，平山，匣。］
即马陆。俗称百足虫。

蛝字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛝； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1081第35
【唐韻】戸閒切，音閑。蟲名。【爾雅·釋蟲】蛝，馬䗃。【疏】蛝蟲，一名馬䗃，一名馬蠲蚐，俗呼馬?。【類篇】一曰蝮蜪也。一曰蚍蜉。　又【集韻】魚巾切，音銀。義同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋蟲疏】一名馬蠲虳。〕　謹照經典釋文虳改蚐。
蛝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蛝字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［xián］
["Guangyun" household leisure cutting, Pingshan, Xie. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛝; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1081 Page 35
[Tang Yun] Cut and cut freely, and sound freely. Insect name. 【Erya·Release insects】Chu, Ma Tuo. [Sparse] worms, a horse tuo, a horse worm, vulgar call horse?. 【Classes】I said that the worm is also. One said mayfly.　[Jiyun] Fish towel cut, silver tone. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Erya·Shichongshu] A horse beetle. 〕 　 I would like to change the 虳虳 according to the classic interpretation.
